name: BroAster
description:
BroAster is all about chicken¡ dancing Chicken that is. Prepare yourself for the battle and avoid getting fried and becoming a nugget.
This is a local-multiplayer game:
ASWD - First Player Controls
Arrow keys - Second Player Controls

Credits:
Director: Daniel Medrano.
Art: Zetless / Emily, Weiao / Cristian Romero,  Vanetsan / Vanessa Tapias.
Lead Programmer: Camus / David Valencia.
Game Design: Jazzby / Yulieth Nuñez, Gabriela Córdoba, Daniel Medrano.
Music and audio implementation: Felipe Rodríguez
